idea:
We are agriculture based Business, planning to grow/produce bamboo in large quantities and setup a bamboo treating plant to produce RAW MATERIAL for other industries. As bamboo has various uses it can be processed and used in many sectors.

Other than just suppling RAW MATERIAL to other industries we also plan to manufacture end products from bamboo which will be eco friendly in nature.
name: MORDE INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

name: TEDTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our vision is to change the way people cook food.

We are developing Robots for Kitchen.

Now even a kid can make Rotis with just a tap of a click.

It is a fully automatic IOT based roti making machine.

Just put the flour, water and oil in the container. Select the number of Rotis, roast and thickness level using an App.

Your Rotis are available on the plates in few minutes.


We also Deliver services to corporate, institutions and students in more than 40 cities of India, ROTECH is a pioneer in the implementations of new ideas and modern technology for all the educational and training needs as it incorporates technology
name: ROTECH SMART VENTURES

idea:
CARVO is a complete auto care Indian start-up, incepted with the purpose of saving water being wasted in washing the vehicle.


With Eco-friendly water-less cleaning, Carvo not only saving treated water but also contributing to reducing carbon footprint and making daily driving a super hygienic and comfortable experience for the whole family.


Daily car wash is 99% an-unorganized sector, neglected for decades, which is primarily attended by local household help who is neither skilled nor equipped with proper equipment's needed to do the job.


Our Mission is to save 21000M liter-water and create employment for more than 10,000 people by 2030.
name: RIDE AUTONOMICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
INBOX CREATIONS is an India-based new startup company in Innovation, Automation and Robotics. We provide Solutions to Industrial Automation challenges as well as innovate in different fields of Electronics and Mechanical integration. We combine the principles of dynamic control and balance with sophisticated mechanical designs, cutting-edge electronics, and next-generation software for high-performance robots equipped with perception, navigation, and intelligence.

Located at our Headquarters in Mumbai, Our Research and Development Department focuses on latest technology which helps us provide fast and accurate solutions.
name: INBOX CREATIONS
